entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
